  <tr>
  <td><div>Using clarifai</div></td>

  <td><div>Gaurav Sood</div></td>

  <td><div>2015-11-10</div></td>

  <td><div>rmarkdown::html_vignette</div></td>

<h2><a id="user-content-using-clarifai" class="anchor" href="#using-clarifai" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Using clarifai</h2>

<h3><a id="user-content-installation" class="anchor" href="#installation" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Installation</h3>

<p>To get the current development version from GitHub:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-c"># install.packages("devtools")</span>
<span class="pl-e">devtools</span><span class="pl-k">::</span>install_github(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>soodoku/clarifai<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)</pre></div>

<h4><a id="user-content-load-up-the-lib" class="anchor" href="#load-up-the-lib" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Load up the lib:</h4>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>library(<span class="pl-smi">clarifai</span>)</pre></div>

<h4><a id="user-content-authentication" class="anchor" href="#authentication" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Authentication</h4>

<p>Start by setting Client ID and secret, which you can get from <a href="https://developer.clarifai.com/">https://developer.clarifai.com/</a></p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>secret_id(c(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>client_id<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>secret<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>))</pre></div>

<p>Next, get the token (the function also sets it):</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>get_token()</pre></div>

<h4><a id="user-content-get-information" class="anchor" href="#get-information" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Get Information</h4>

<p>Get information about your application:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>get_info()</pre></div>

<pre><code>## Status message:  All images in request have completed successfully.
</code></pre>

<h4><a id="user-content-get-tags" class="anchor" href="#get-tags" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Get Tags</h4>

<p>We are now all set. Let's play. Get tags of a remote image:</p>

<p><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/0718dd2f13ea02e1edbce64cdbc00a04acad2acb/687474703a2f2f7777772e636c6172696661692e636f6d2f696d672f6d6574726f2d6e6f7274682e6a7067" target="_blank"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/0718dd2f13ea02e1edbce64cdbc00a04acad2acb/687474703a2f2f7777772e636c6172696661692e636f6d2f696d672f6d6574726f2d6e6f7274682e6a7067" alt="Metro North" data-canonical-src="http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg" style="max-width:100%;"></a></p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">res</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> tag_image_urls(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
head(<span class="pl-smi">res</span>)</pre></div>

<pre><code>##                                       img_url           tags
## 1 http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg          train
## 2 http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg       railroad
## 3 http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg        station
## 4 http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg           rail
## 5 http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg transportation
## 6 http://www.clarifai.com/img/metro-north.jpg       platform
##               probs
## 1 0.999398589134216
## 2 0.998031497001648
## 3 0.997042655944824
## 4 0.995042085647583
## 5 0.995012819766998
## 6 0.994919180870056
</code></pre>

<p>Get tags for a local image:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-smi">path</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> system.file(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>inst/extdata/<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">package</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>clarifai<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
<span class="pl-smi">filep</span> <span class="pl-k">&lt;-</span> paste0(<span class="pl-smi">path</span>, <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>/metro-north.jpg<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
tag_images(<span class="pl-smi">filep</span>)</pre></div>

<p>Provide feedback about tags for an image, including suggesting new tags, suggesting that some tags be removed etc. </p>

<h4><a id="user-content-provide-feedback" class="anchor" href="#provide-feedback" aria-hidden="true"><span class="octicon octicon-link"></span></a>Provide Feedback</h4>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre>feedback(<span class="pl-v">file_path</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>path_to_image<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">feedback_type</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>add_tags<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>, <span class="pl-v">feedback_value</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>suggested_tag<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)

<span class="pl-c">## $status_code</span>
<span class="pl-c">## [1] "OK"</span>

<span class="pl-c">## $status_msg</span>
<span class="pl-c">## [1] "Feedback successfully recorded. "</span></pre></div>
</article>
  </div>

</div>
